      • alert

        public UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder alert(String message)
        Triggers a dialog, displaying the value.
        Parameters:
        message - that will be displayed on the alert UI element
        Returns:
        the current UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder instance

      • sound

        public UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder sound(String sound)
        Plays a given sound - On iOS no API needs to be invoked to play the sound file. However on other platforms custom API call may be required.
        Parameters:
        sound - i.e name of the sound file
        Returns:
        the current UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder instance

      • badge

        public UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder badge(String badge)
        Sets the value of the badge icon - no iOS API needs to be invoked by the app developer.
        Parameters:
        badge - i.e file name of the icon
        Returns:
        the current UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder instance

      • simplePush

        public UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder simplePush(String version)
        Needed when sending a message to a SimplePush Network
        Parameters:
        version - to pass to the broadcast channel, i.e "version=5"
        Returns:
        the current UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder instance

      • userData

        public UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder userData(String key,
                                              String value)
        Adds an custom value for the given key. This is used to pass user data to the UnifiedPush Server
        Parameters:
        key - of an user data entry
        value - of an user data entry
        Returns:
        the current UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder instance

      • userData

        public UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder userData(Map<String,Object> userDataMap)
        Adds a map containing custom key/value entries. This is used to pass user data to the UnifiedPush Server
        Parameters:
        userDataMap - containing custom key/value entries
        Returns:
        the current UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder instance

      • criteria

        public UnifiedMessage.CriteriaBuilder criteria()

      • config

        public UnifiedMessage.ConfigBuilder config()

      • windows

        public UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder.WindowsBuilder windows()
        Windows specific push notification settings support for Tile, Raw, Badge and Toast messages For all the templates as much as possible the main parts of the message are re-used. Alert is the main text as is the badge number for badge notifications. Only specific windows settings are put in this part of the message and ignored by other message senders.
        Returns:
        a UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder.WindowsBuilder instance

      • apns

        public UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder.ApnsBuilder apns()
        Apns specific push notification settings like "title", "actionCategory" ... more info about apns
        Returns:
        a UnifiedMessage.MessageBuilder.ApnsBuilder instance

      • build

        public UnifiedMessage build()

        protected org.jboss.aerogear.unifiedpush.message.Message getObject()
